<NEW>

WHEELIE nodded up at the=
 larger-than-usual group of DINOBOTS he was used to interacting with.  Gest=
uring over at BACKSTOP, the small mechanoid said quietly, "Can you say what=
 is going on?  I still have not heard a story of what is wrong.  How did GR=
IMLOCK and them all get down here?"  He had not seen his 'friends' since th=
e end of the GREAT WAR and the final battles between AUTOBOT and DECEPTICON=
, before the GREAT REFORMATTING had taken place and most had been UPGRADED =
to MAXIMAL and PREDACON.

So how had GRIMLOCK and his team gotten sent seve=
ral hundred vorns over into the past, to the BEAST WARS?
